product_overview: AI Question Generator is a comprehensive platform integrating advanced AI technologies and robust content management to facilitate question generation, management, and delivery for educational purposes. It supports multi-format inputs, intelligent content extraction with preservation, and diverse output templates to empower educators and content creators.
core_goals: Enable AI-powered question generation from diverse inputs including text, image, PDF, and URL.
Ensure 100% preservation of original content including complex tables, images, and mathematical equations.
Provide rich multilingual support for Hindi, English, and mixed language content.
Offer advanced searching, filtering, and tagging to organize large question banks efficiently.
Facilitate seamless creation, editing, and management of questions and papers through intuitive UIs.
Support multiple export formats such as DOCX, PDF, Google Docs, HTML, and Markdown with perfect preservation.
Implement robust collaboration, versioning, and user management features for institutional use.
Deliver fast paper generation workflows reducing time from hours to minutes.
Support extensive accessibility, performance, and security standards.
Enable advanced analytics, session management, and live teaching tools integration.
key_features: Universal Content Extraction with full formatting, tables, images, equations, and structural elements.
Intelligent Table Handling - detection, editing, and rendering with complex structure and rich styling.
Multilingual Content Support including Hindi, English, Sanskrit, Urdu and others with accurate font and special character handling.
Smart AI-Powered Question Detection and classification by type, marks, difficulty with context associations.
Advanced database schema for questions, tables, images, equations, papers, templates and user data.
Powerful Search and Filter systems with fuzzy search, multi-character filters, and saved presets.
Rich Content Editor supporting WYSIWYG editing, visual table and equation editors, image and options managers.
Bulk Import and Management including batch upload, bulk edit, and smart suggestions.
Flexible Paper Builder with drag-drop, AI smart generation, and template-based quick start modes.
Professional Template System with customizable styles for print and digital outputs.
Multi-format Export with perfect preservation across DOCX, PDF, Google Docs, HTML, and Markdown.
Advanced Presentation Mode features including full-screen, navigation, timer, bookmarking, notes, annotations, and shortcuts.
Cloud Syncing, Offline Mode, and Security Features ensuring reliable data management and protection.
Integrated Help, Documentation, AI-Prompt based development instructions, testing and deployment plans.
user_flow_summary: User uploads or inputs content (text, image, PDF, URL) optionally in batch.
AI processes document to extract structured questions, tables, images, and equations with metadata.
User reviews and confirms extracted questions with preview and editing tools.
User organizes questions using advanced filtering, tagging, and collections.
User creates question sets or entire papers via manual drag-drop, AI smart generator, or templates.
User customizes templates, configures presentation or export preferences.
User previews generated question papers with live template switching and editing.
User exports papers and associated assets in multiple formats or prints directly.
Teacher accesses sets for live teaching with interactive presentation features including annotation and timer.
Session data and analytics are recorded, with options for review, sharing, and improvement.
validation_criteria: 100% content preservation verified for all uploaded documents including tables and equations.
AI extraction accuracy >95% on structured questions, metadata, and content detection.
Exported documents match original content in appearance and structure across all supported formats.
System supports at least Hindi, English, and mixed language content with correct rendering.
Search queries return accurate and relevant results within 500ms for large question databases.
Bulk import processes handle multi-file uploads up to 20 files with comprehensive error handling.
Live presentation features respond with less than 200ms latency.
Data consistency and integrity maintained with version control and audit logs.
Security protocols and access control tested and verified against specified standards.
User satisfaction metrics show NPS >8/10 and significant time savings in pilot user testing.
